title: The Lemonade Business That My 6 Year Old Twin Boys Built
itunes:title: The Lemonade Business That My 6 Year Old Twin Boys Built
description:
Entrepreneurship is so easy, a child could grasp it. Literally. Complicated tactics and intricate philosophies aside, it's the foundational basics that make up a lasting, successful business - and sometimes, we adults could use the reminder.
 
On this episode of the Underdog Empowerment podcast, Zach interviews his twin boys, Liam and Landon, on their booming lemonade stand business, the lessons they've learned about saving and investing money, and how each boy found his role on the operations side. Listen in for some heartwarming, incredibly insightful moments from two young entrepreneurs.
 
Shownotes: https://underdogempowerment.com/lemonade-business/
 
Get More Involved:
